title: VA -  Music From Vanilla Sky - Soundtrack FLAC
description:
VA - Music From Vanilla Sky - 2001

Not much to say about this soundtrack.  It's pretty self explanatory.
There is an interesting bit of trivia though:  the artist credited with singing
"I Fall Apart," is Julianna Gianni, the character played by Cameron Diaz--
Diaz actually sang the song.

For more Vanilla Sky trivia:
imdb.com/title/tt0259711/trivia

The disc was ripped to flac using EAC.  The upload includes 
cue sheet, log file, playlist and artwork.  Enjoy.

For more on flac:
sourceforge.net
dbpoweramp.com
exactaudiocopy.de
